data.description: Location, Location, Location. 3 Bedrooms, 1 Bathroom, 2 car garage moving ready townhome. Facing at a  community pool. Close to schools, Restaurants, Bart Station Highways 92-84 & 880. SOLD AS IS. Pre Escrow open with Chicago Title Company with Joanne Stellini. Escrow # 5872100839. Open House Saturday July 31st and Sunday August 1st 1pm to 4pm.
